values: i'm three weeks away from my due date and very excited to finally see, kiss, hug, hold my daughter. on the flip side, i'm completely horrified of labor. i have no idea what to expect, how it's really going to feel, what's going to happen, if everything is going to go alright. i'm just at a total loss, because i've never done this before. and as much as i'm excited to be able to hold this child, rather than just hauling her around in my uterus, i have no idea what i'm going to do with her! i've never lived with a newborn, i've never had anyone depend on me to do EVERYTHING for them. i have no idea whether or not i'm going to be a good mother. and then..what if something happens and something goes wrong. i don't want to get my hopes up about having a healthy baby, because what if she's not? babies die all the time because of complications during labor and then there's SIDS. what do i do then? i've been waiting nearly a year for this baby to come and she could die or get hurt or get terribly sick and then what? i know i shouldn't be doing all this "what if" nonsense, but it's really hard not to think about all the awful things that could happen when you have no idea what the outcome is going to be like. and i know it's like that for so many situations, but this is another living, breathing (almost) human being that i made! that i've been carrying around and growing to perfection for 9 months. i just want her to be healthy and i want her to be here, so that we can love her. devin is so excited - he keeps telling her to come out, so he can hold her.  she moves around every time he comes home from work & she hears his voice.  we both love watching her wiggle her butt inside my belly.  right now she has the hiccups.

so, today i'm 21 weeks, 1 day pregnant.  and i got an ultrasound this morning for an anatomy screening, meaning we found out that we're having a girl!  seeing that teeny baby on the screen was the absolute coolest thing i've ever looked at in my whole life.  she was moving around so much & her mouth was opening and closing & she kept kicking against the wand the tech was using.  i started crying & devin was right there & he said he almost started crying & it was so amazing.  i'm so happy & i don't think my mood will change for quite a few days.  i'm having a girl and i'm going to name her chloe. :)

i don't like anything anymore. i don't like being pregnant. i don't like anyone i used to hang out with.  i want to run away and forget any of this ever happened.  but it fucking sucks, because as much as i hate being pregnant, this baby thing has seeped into my mind & i can't stop think about him/her.  and it makes me feel confused & sad & like a bad person.

i'm better lately.  not so sad.  not so bored.  not so lonely.  getting over my hormones, i guess.  or just realizing that that's all everything is.  three out of four of my summer classes began this week.  very interesting ones - women & social action, politics in movies, and art of africa, asia, and the americas.  as for the baby update, this kid has been moving so much lately.  and i went to the dr. last week & dev came with & he got to hear the baby's heartbeat for the first time.  it was amazing, he was so elated afterward.  i'm glad he got to hear that, because i've been feeling bad, 'cause the baby isn't big enough for him to feel he/she moving, so he hasn't really had any idea as to what's going on in there.  :)

...i'm finding myself being more in love with devin...he's just being so sweet & he desperately wants this baby to be a girl, which i just think is cute...i'm very glad that i'm involved with someone, that after 2.5 years, he still makes me trip over my words and get butterflies...although, i suppose that could be the baby.  hah.

i feel like some kind of god damned leper.  i haven't seen/heard from any of my friends in going on three weeks.  i'm not contagious...i'm not that boring now...i can stay awake if i take a nap before i go out...i can still smoke grass, i just don't as often.  i don't know.  i guess i can't blame people if they don't want to hang out with a pregnant chick, but i just didn't think that people i've been friends with close to ten years would bail on me just because of this.  it just doesn't make this any easier.  and i wish i could just run away, but i can't because i'm not going to just take devin's baby away from him, 'cause that would make him sad and i love him and stuff, so i don't want to make him sad.  i don't know what the hell to do, but i can't go through this without friends.
i feel like i didn't consider some of the outcomes of my situation.  i'm very confused and need help.

the weather is not helping my mood.  i've been awake since 4 this morning and i should probably take a nap.  i'm hungry and want pasta salad from woody's.  why don't they deliver?  i don't like being sad..i cannot for the life of me get out of this damn funk..blahhhhhh

the nausea is waning finally and so are the migraines.  but now i'm retaining a lot of water and my right knee is swollen for no reason?  and i feel like i'm schizophrenic when i get filled with rage out of nowhere, but then start laughing within the next 5 minutes.  my emotions are making me feel like i'm going through puberty again (ewww).  and it's very strange, because i can feel where the baby is and it's kind of odd to be growing a person.  but it's pretty cool, too, 'cause i helped make him/her..hopefully him.  i want a boy...so does Devin.  he's started yelling "boooooyyyyy" directly into my uterus....although, we can't figure out a name for a boy.  well, i think we have a middle name.. Liam, 'cause it's the irish version of William and that's Devin's middle name, so i thought that was kinda cool...but, we have no first names....okay, i'm done with my baby update.
i'm very tired of being tired all of the time.  and i'm pretty over feeling sick to my stomach constantly.  i don't understand why people get pregnant on purpose.
uhm. devin and i made a baby. and it will be born sometime around november 15.

i like to think about things that make no sense and make me hurt.
i wish i could feel good enough.

so, i'm getting really excited.
we have 17 days left until we leave.
we have an actual apartment, like...
a place to live that is not someone else's home.
i can't wait to hang out with my friends and see my siblings
and my mom and my cousins and my grandma.
and to be in NY!!
'cause NY is better than North Carolina.
I'm still trying to figure out what's going on with my transfer,
but in the meantime, i'm looking for jobs elsewhere just in case.
i just can't wait to be home..

only 44 days left until we move home!!
i'm soo happy!
if i can't stop myself from hurting, i'll just add to the pain

i don't know what to do.  today, i took on a third job working two days a week at a "green" cafe and catering for them about 5 days a month.  i began my second job, baby-sitting two monsters, a week ago.  tomorrow, i am beginning the process of transferring to the sales floor in nordstrom.  my aunt is really happy that i'm working so much and so am i.  i don't think i've ever been so motivated in my life.  it's really weird, 'cause i feel like devin and i switched our priorities around when we moved down here.  a year ago today, i was jobless and a bum.  devin did everything for me and worked two jobs and paid for everything.  since we moved, devin has kept his part-time job at ben and jerry's ice cream scoop shop and i don't have time to shower.  i don't care about him working part-time, i like being busy and feeling responsible.  my aunt, however, has a really big issue with devin working part-time.  she told me today that devin is dragging me down...i told her that i completely disagree.  i love him and i see nothing wrong with what he's doing.  i know we're young and blah blah, but we've formed a pretty tight companionship and we share our finances and i don't have a problem with that.  i can't explain how i feel about devin, but i think he's the greatest guy in the whole world and you know, sometimes one of us just needs some down time and the other has to support things and that's okay with me.  he's depressed and i feel bad, because it hurts me that he's sad because of one of my family members.  i want to move back to ny, but that would be one of the stupidest decisions i could make.   i have 3 really well-paying jobs now and it's so much cheaper down here.  we're visiting home for 3 days in march.  i don't talk to anyone...i'm sad.  i want someone to come visit me if i get an apartment down here.  i don't know what to do.

i have an issue understanding how some families just don't like each other.  i spent my thanksgiving listening to arguing.  the hunter's are just not happy people and i don't get it.  i've never been at my grandma carlino's while everyone is over and heard everyone screaming at each other.  i mean, the carlino's are really loud, but not in a negative way.  i get really upset when i'm told that i'm a hunter, 'cause i'm not mean.  i don't think that i'm better than everyone, i don't judge people, i don't say bad things about people that i don't even know.  my aunt that i'm currently living with likes to say bad things about my mom.  she also decided to start bashing my mom's boyfriend, Bruce last night.  and that made me really upset, because she doesn't know anything about him or the situation between him and my mother.  and he's so nice and he's such a good dad to my siblings and me and he doesn't even have to be.  i don't like hearing people that have taken care of me being talked about like shit.  it hurts my feelings.  and the bigger issue is, all of the hunters are like that.  they all just dislike my mom and the rest of her family and i don't understand why.  they're not bad people...but my other family has to refer to them as white trash.  i love my dad's side of the family, but i'm having a difficult time liking them.  my aunt has also just been being really mean to me lately, for reasons that i'm not sure of.  she yelled at me last night and called me a selfish bitch for talking to her while she was watching a t.v. sitcom.  i decided that that made no sense whatsoever, so the comment didn't hurt me, but the fact that it just didn't make sense and it seemed as though she was just yelling at me to hurt my feelings did hurt.  she called me a fat ass the other day and i asked her not to speak to me like that and she told me that i was an idiot and to bite her.  because of my family's actions, devin has decided that he wants to move back up north as well.  so we are both taking on second jobs after the holidays and moving to pennsylvania in the summer.  
i am happy, because i just made my last payment to walden savings bank, where i had a delinquent account.  so i can now open a bank account - finally!! - after not having one for over a year.  devin is getting a motorcycle and i'm getting a car.  he shaved his entire face yesterday.  he has a chin!!  and our 1 year anniversary is in 2 days.  there are good things.

new number, darlings. 919 308 1376.  call me, text me. whatever.  i miss everyone.  all i've been doing is working.  i can't wait to come home for christmas.  devin and i are doing really well again, though.  i got over being completely depressed, so things don't suck completely anymore.  and he has a phone, too.  so it'll make things easier.  okay. bye.

i guess i should update this.  things are going well - davey was here last week & that made me very happy and a lot less depressed.  less homesick, too.  devin and i have been having many conversations and we've decided that we're not going to live together after next summer.  i want to move to philadelphia, 'cause i'm hating being this far away from home & i want to live in amajor city.  and i really want to see if i can do something that big by myself.  we're not breaking up.  just being independent from each other.  we share everything and we've been living together since we started dating and it's not really doing amazing things to our relationship.  moving down here together was more to get both of us away from our mothers and away from cornwall.  things with us are better now.  i totally didn't want to be near him for a good 3 weeks and we didn't even sleep together for 2 of those weeks.  our anniversary is next month and i'm excited.  i'm also almost done paying off my bank.  one more payment and i'm done.  and i'm finally getting my own phone, so i'll have a new number in the coming weeks.  work is alright.  i hate the people that come into that place.  i hate working for corporations.  it just blows.  but it pays well for down here, so i'm sticking with it and transferring to another nordstrom in king of prussia, pa.  it's about 25 minutes from south philly, so that's about the same commute i'm making down here.  i figure it would just be easier to have a job when i get there.  although, i'm flirting with the idea of coming home at the end of june for my brothers' graduation and staying at my mom's for a month or two and getting a puppy, since i'm not entirely thrilled with living by myself and chillin' for a bit.  depends on how much money i can save up in between now and then.  i'll be home dec 23 and i can't wait.  i hate being here away from all my friends.  it sucks.  it doesn't suck as much as it did, though.  okay, i guess that's it.

i miss everyone a lot.
like, it hurts.
i'm bored and lonely and don't want new friends.
i want everyone to move down here.
it's really awesome...
...but i need certain people here.

i'm going green!  i have a bike that i'm going to use as my transportation,
'cause everything, i mean EVERYTHING is ten minutes away.
devin and i went to ninth yesterday and walked around.
i applied at this shop, vaguely reminiscent that is like a little boutique version of urban outfitters.
it's cute.  there's a greenway that goes all through downown and there's a whole foods market (which is my favorite grocery store ever)
and devin applied there. and right next to whole foods is a ben and jerry's!!!  5 minutes away from my house!
devin also applied there - i've vowed to never scoop ice cream ever again, so i couldn't.
i think we're going to northgate park today and brightleaf square.
i'll keep you posted.

so, i did it.
devin and i moved to durham, north carolina.
we arrived monday night.
yesterday was spent staying out of the heat and unpacking our clothes.
then we went swimming at my aunt's friend's house and had dinner there.
today, i went downtown with my aunt to go apply at this pizza place the mellow mushroom.
it seemed very chill in there.
she took me up ninth street, which has a lot of cool hole-in-the-wall restaurants and little boutiques.
i've looked at apartments a bit and 2 bedrooms are around 5-600 down here.
camel lights are $4 a pack.
and i'm coming home december 23rd through the 29th.
plane tickets will be bought in the next few weeks.
i miss everyone...i started missing everyone the second we pulled out of the drive way
and it hurt like fuck to leave all of my family and friends,
but...i'm happy, and i'm not stressed out and there are so many fucking opportunities here.
i'm excited about my new life, but there's no way in hell will i forget what i have at home.

i had such an exhausting weekend.
my kitchen floor was very interesting friday night after i ate mushrooms.
then i played with lights saturday night and saw fire demons
and had the absolute amazing sex ever
after ingesting ecstasy.
then there was work which was horrible,
because i was the only waitress for breakfast and everyone
decided to come to friendly's after i get there.
then the car broke down.
in bloomingburg.
and jesse had to come retrieve us, which i felt like a total
asshole for, 'cause he was driving around this stupid town
and we couldn't really tell him where we were
'cause we didn't know where we were
'cause the asshole kid we were driving home just went home and went to sleep
instead of helping us out.

everything worked out though.
we're picking the car up today and it will be fixed.
and i got a shitload more hours at work...
...which is cool...
and i still have three days off a week,
i'm just working longer shifts which means more tips and a bigger paycheck.
i think that's the end.

i'm very sick of the bullshit in this house.  i can't stand the screaming and the disrespect.  i can no longer keep money anywhere but on me, because it'll be taken from me.  Devin and i get bitched at to help pay bills, but when we give money, it's not spent on bills.  i'm tired of being a mom to a 16 year old who isn't mine.  i can't even save some fucking money to get out of here.  i need a vacation.

i haven't updated this thing in a while.
but there's not too much going on.
i go to work 4 or 5 days a week.
so, i'm making money which is all good.
the weekend looks like it's going to be fun, though.
the human condition's show is tomorrow night at crannel
and i will be attending that.
then there's an after-party of some sort, which i will most likely be attending.
and i don't have to work on sunday, which is nice, because Devin doesn't have to work sunday either.
i don't know....
that's all the interesting news i have...

life has been interesting the past few weeks.  i'm working.  but that's kind of causing Devin and i to not see each other, because his job decides to have him working in the morning & then i work all afternoon.  and apparently we're the weird couple that has to be together constantly for us not to fight.  but, the money is really good at Friendly's and i like everyone except two people that i work with me & they're just assholes, so it's alright.  now i'm hungry, so i'm going to go eat.

today was wonderful:
i got a job at Friendly's in the Newburgh Mall.
Devin finally got the car registered & it moves and it's legal and it's our and it's fabulous.
i saw a few people that i never see anymore, which was amazing.
and we went to the diner with other friends to celebrate our wonderful day.
and now i'm going to smoke some pot with my lover and go to bed.
i'm so happy.

so, i've had an awesome 2 days & nights - 
friday night, Jonny and Jannelle came over to BBQ & smoke.
then yesterday they picked Dev & me up and we went to the river to chill and play frisbee.
then we decided to go camping and we ended up doing that in Kait's yard with her and Davey.
which turned into Dev & me rolling last night.
and Jonny and Jannelle and Kait and Davey went to the 2 Alice's to see Mike D. & Loomis play an open mic
and i didn't want to go for some personal reasons, but as Devin and i walked to cumby's, i said we should just walk up there.
so we get there and i called my sister, 'cause she was there and then we were inside
and my sister's sitting on my lap and i just start rolling face.
and mike and mike sounded amazing and i could feel the music and everything.
then we went to hannafords and then back to Kait's
and then Dev & i pretty much just stayed in the tent and listened to our friends talking and laughing.
it was nice to hang out with everyone again, 'cause it doesn't happen anymore and it's sad.
and i'm all still fucked up.
and we're having an aqua teen party tonight at jonny's, then going back to the tent at Kait's house and partying some more.

today was good.
there's some shiny new bling on my finger.
:)

i had a dream thursday night that my grandpa was still alive & i was at my grandparent's house & my grandpa died while i was there.  it was a really disturbing dream.  i don't know what i'm feeling anymore.  good things, bad things, things that i don't even know what they are.  on alighter note, Devin and i are getting married in late august.  i've never been happier in my life.
i have a lot to share, but once again, i can't figure out how to type it all.

well, he didn't have two weeks left.  my grandpa died on friday morning.  it just feels odd, really.  dev & i went over to my mom's after she called & told me, then we went to my grandma's & we were all there and i realized i've never been at my grandparents without my grandpa being there, unless he was at church.  it felt strange without him sitting on the spot on the couch where he always sits, watching football or sleeping or yelling at all of us to stop running around.  i keep feeling really uneasy whenever anyone sits where he always sat.  i wanted to yell at my cousin because she was sitting at the head of the table, opposite my grandma, where he sat everytime we had dinner.  devin was going to sit on the chair on the front little porch when we were out having a cigarette, but i told him not to, because that's always where my grandpa sat.  it's hard, because my grandparents have always been a huge part in my life & now half of them is gone.  it's easier, though, because my whole family is around and devin is around helping me out & dealing with my family with me.  the wake is tomorrow and the funeral is tuesday and i'm nervous because i've never been to a funeral & i haven't been in a church in a long time.  i don't know.

i went to go visit my grandpa yesterday for the first time in 2 weeks.  before Devin and i left, i called my mom to let her know i was going & she started to tell me how he was - she said he looked 20 years older than the last time i saw him & there would be a chance he didn't know who i was.  i got pretty upset talking to her about it, because i didn't know how bad he was.  when i got there, i went it to say hi and he just kind of stared at me & i got so upset when i saw him, because even though my mom told me to try to prepare me, it wasn't something i could picture.  he looks so old & he's got the hiccups, because the tumor is pressing down on his diaphragm & he's had them for 2 days now.  he's hooked up to an air machine thing & a morphine drip.  his alzheimer's is really kicking in because of the cancer & he doesn't really have a clue as to what's going on.  my grandparent's friends were over, so i was having some tea with them in the next room & i decided to just go talk to my grandpa, 'cause i figured it wouldn't hurt to just talk to him & right when i was walking into the living room, he was just getting up & trying to go somewhere, but i'm not really sure what he was doing & he had no idea what he was doing either, so i was just like, "what're ya doin' grandpa?"  and he just kind of looked at me really confused and i didn't really know what to do, 'cause he was hooked up to that oxygen thing & the morphine IV.  he's got about two weeks left.

i'm horribly afraid & i'm not exactly sure why.  i have this awful feeling of anxiety in my chest & it just won't go away.  it would probably be a good idea for me to go to sleep for the day, but i feel like i'll miss something important if i do that.

i'm bored & awake too early, because i went to sleep too early.
no one else is awake...blah

i have new hair.





i'm a fan of my des.




we so crazy.


and that's what i look like rocking out to le tigre.

i've felt kind of funny the past few days because of how i feel about my man.  we've been together for nearly two months & it's been absolutely wonderful and we get along so well and what i've been feeling funny about is: i don't feel like cheating on him.  i haven't once.  in the past week i've seen one ex boyfriend & 5 other random guys i've either slept with or have fooled around with.  normally when i see this ex boyfriend, i sleep with him or want to or want to be with him.  i saw him yesterday & i felt none of that.  what's weird is that in any other relationship i've been in, i would have cheated on Devin at least 35 times with at least 10 different guys by now.  
i think this is because of a few reasons:  one being that i've grown up some in the past few years & i no longer find it necessary to sleep with several guys & i'm rather content with this monogamy thing.  i'm also realizing that i actually have respect for my boyfriend & his feelings.  i can't think of ever doing anything to hurt him at all.  i also think it has to do with the fact that i was cheated on by Pete for the last two months of our relationship and that was the first time i had been cheated on & it really does hurt and i don't think i realized how much it did when i was the one doing the cheating.  and also..i'm head over heels in love with Devin.  everyone has seen how disgustingly happy we are together.  this is the first time i have ever had this much respect for anyone i've been with.  this is the first time i've stayed faithful in a relationship.  this is the first time i've actually believed that it's going to last, rather than just wanted it to.  
i'm just so happy..

i just saw A Night At The Museum with my darling & mr. vh and it was suprisingly good!  i really love movies that are really child-like & ridiculous.  and it's also really warm out, which is nice.  and i'm excited for tomorrow night, because i get to go to niki's which i think is wonderful, because i have not participated in nearly anything that has involved her for several years.  i'm in an amazing mood.  i'm going to go read while the mister showers.

it's morning and it's nice out and i'm happy and devin is trying to sound like billy bob thorton and des is trying to straighten her hair but she keeps burning herself and it's really funny, 'cause she's pretty tarded and i love her.  and dev is sucking at rolling a joint and i think that's it.  and my hair turned very blue and it looks badass.

i'm not exactly sure why one of my best friends has to continously make me feel like shit & the worst person ever.  it hurts so bad.  i'm so easily brought down by other people & i know i should work on it, but it's difficult.  people that i'm close to..what they're feeling & what they're feeling about me affects my mood about things in general and affects my mood about myself.  i now feel like i'm an awful friend as well as an awful person, because i have a friend who apparently enjoys making me feel this way.  i'm trying to not feel like shit, because i know that i'm trying to do what's right & he's just doing this to hurt me, which does make me the bigger person.  i'm trying to avoid him, because it hurts too much to be talked to like shit, but it's kind of difficult when i live in a house that he's always in.  i think i'm just going to try to go out or something.  i need to be away from all this negativity.

i had an absolutely wonderful new year's.  i was with my best friends drinking wine, then with them at the ball drop in c-o-h dancing around.  i got kissed at midnight for the first time ever & i was so unbelievably happy.  i hope everyone had an excellent time & good luck in 2007.  my resolution is to do everything in my power to make myself happy & everyone i care about happy.

i love everything about my current relationship.  we're functioning very well living together.  we have fun & make each other completely happy.  i can be myself around him, because he is my best friend.  i'm not sure i have had anyone ever treat me as well as he does.  i can't stop being happy.  we've been together for a month now & i want it to keep going.  this just feels so right.

i had such an absolutely wonderful christmas: i woke up next to someone i'm completely in love with, then opened presents with him Bryan, Wendy, and Dez.  then i went to my mom's and opened presents - all of my presents were very thoughtful & i loved them.  then my mom, Pat and i went to my grandmother's and i spent the rest of the afternoon with my cousins.  after i got home, devin was at his grandparents' house & he told me to come over for dessert..which led to him getting me wasted off too many glasses of wine.  we came home to our best friends (davey, kait, dez, jannelle, jonny, and dyl) and opened presents with them.  my brother is also here..as well as wesley & jewish.  i think this is the best christmas i have ever had in my entire life.  i hope everyone had an amazing day also.  i love you all.

Dear My Darlings,
I wish everyone the best holidays ever this year.  I hope everyone spends time with the people that they love and care about.  I hope everyone is happy & remembers that it's not about presents, it's about being with everyone & giving and making everyone around you and yourself happy.  

MERRY CHRISTMAS

Love, Jessi

my life as of lately:

:

i just spent too long cleaning mine and devin's room.  it was so messy and cluttered and ahh.  and it smelled like a bird, 'cause he has one and i hate her and her name is cookie and she sucks and makes too much noise all the damn time.  but i lit some incense and now i'm trying to think of when i want to take a shower and what i should do tonight.  i want to do something fun or producitve.  i wish we had food here, so i could cook everyone dinner.  i guess i'll figure out something...i do need to go get my damn phone from my mom's, though.  and i think i'm going to grab my laundry basket to put in our room, so dirty clothes don't end up on the floor and shit.  i wish we had an apartment.  we have too much stuff to fit into this little room.  i should probably get a job then...

i'm bored and overly happy and i meant to do a lot of things today, but there was a lot going on last night & then there was a lot of lying around on mine and the man's part the whole morning and early afternoon before he had to go to work.  i'm going to go back to the coffee shop that i was working at and try to get my job back, because they're hiring and i need money very badly - i am very very broke & in debt.  it's bad.  but, not really, 'cause i'm alive still, so i don't care that much.  and i dyed my hair yesterday & it's a very lovely shade of brown & i'm even hotter than i was 2 days ago.  i really would love to organize mine & dev's room, but we can't figure out how to do it.  we have a lot of stuff...and it's hard to find a place to put it all in one room.  we need an apartment.  ahhh...

i'm not sure i like how things are going with certain people lately.  a lot of things seem to be about drugs and money in my circle of friends and i feel it's getting to a point of ridiculousness.  i'm greatly missing all of us going out and doing things or just hanging out and doing stupid things rather than someone being on drugs or us just sitting around smoking pot on the porch.  it's getting lame & i want to talk about it with certain friends, but i feel like it's kind of pointless, so i might just stop talking to someone for a little bit.  i don't know.  i'm really distraught about the whole situation.  i don't think that things should be like this and i'm sad that things have gotten to a lame point .
i'm about to have a very excellent night.  i'm quite excited.  i love everything in the world.  especially the mister that i'm rolling with tonight.  it will be absolutely fabulous.
